alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 2:00PM MST until February 15 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY FOR ELEVATIONS BETWEEN 3000 AND 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 3000 feet near Camp Verde, Chino Valley, Congress, Cottonwood, Paulden and Prescott Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Snow forecast from 2 PM Today to 6 AM Wednesday: Camp Verde 0 to 1 inches Chino Valley 0 to 1 inches Congress 0 to 1 inches Cottonwood 0 to 1 inches Paulden 0 to 1 inches Prescott Valley 1 to 3 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
